chattanooga.neighborhoods: Downtown, North Shore, Southside, St. Elmo, East Brainerd, Missionary Ridge
chattanooga.meetingHighlights: Riverfront and downtown meetings with a strong outdoor-community presence; active speaker nights and newcomer-friendly beginner meetings.
chattanooga.transitInfo: CARTA buses serve Chattanooga and surrounding communities; Chattanooga Metropolitan Airport for regional flights.

knoxville.neighborhoods: Downtown, Old City, Fourth & Gill, Fort Sanders, West Knoxville, Bearden
knoxville.meetingHighlights: University-influenced meeting schedule with many student-friendly and neighborhood groups; robust evening options.
knoxville.transitInfo: KAT buses provide local transit; McGhee Tyson Airport (TYS) serves regional flights.

memphis.neighborhoods: Downtown, Midtown, Cooper-Young, Beale Street, Harbor Town, South Main
memphis.meetingHighlights: Large urban fellowship with many neighborhood and downtown meetings, strong tradition of speaker nights and Big Book studies.
memphis.transitInfo: MATA buses provide transit across the city; Memphis International Airport (MEM) serves national flights.

murfreesboro.neighborhoods: Downtown, Blackman, Middle Tennessee State University area
murfreesboro.meetingHighlights: Fast-growing suburban meetings with many newcomer-focused groups and strong weekday attendance.
murfreesboro.transitInfo: Murfreesboro Rover provides local routes; regional access via I-24 and proximity to Nashville's airports.

nashville.neighborhoods: Downtown, The Gulch, East Nashville, Germantown, 12South, Midtown
nashville.meetingHighlights: Extensive and diverse meeting schedule citywide with many specialty, music-industry friendly, and newcomer-support groups.
nashville.transitInfo: WeGo Public Transit serves Nashville; Nashville International Airport (BNA) for national and international flights.

clarksville.meetingHighlights: Neighborhood and downtown meetings with steady evening attendance and community outreach.
clarksville.transitInfo: Clarksville Transit System and regional highways; proximity to Fort Campbell influences meeting schedules.

johnson-city.meetingHighlights: University-linked and community meetings with active evening and recovery resources.
johnson-city.transitInfo: Johnson City Transit and regional bus links; Tri-Cities Regional Airport for flights.
